title: Curve GMX+ Carbon fork fits massive tires for custom adventure bikepacking builds
content:
When launched their huge-tire GMX+ monster off-road adventure bikepacking rig last year, much of its capability came down to the titanium bike’s new massive full carbon fork. Now, Curve is pulling that non-suspension-corrected GMX+ Carbon fork off on its own, so more adventurous riders can build up their own custom limitless backcountry bikepacking bikes… Curve […]

The post Curve GMX+ Carbon fork fits massive tires for custom adventure bikepacking builds appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
